tier1_approved.description: Astrodome exterior, real photograph. Wet asphalt, sodium vapor lights, brutalist architecture.
Silhouette at chain-link fence, SERVICE MAINTENANCE sign. Legible text, correct DOF.
Puddle/fire reflection insert. Wet asphalt caustics, bokeh droplets.
tier1_approved.use: Style reference — insert shots, wet surface textures

tier1_approved.description: Macro insert — brushed metal, anatomically correct hand, anamorphic streak, shallow DOF.

tier2_usable.description: Wide establishing, woman at glass door. Cool steel-blue grade, shallow focus.
tier2_usable.use: Style reference — interior/character scenes. Slight AI skin softness.

tier2_usable.description: Silhouette corridor walk. Excellent backlighting, atmospheric haze.
tier2_usable.use: Style reference — silhouette/corridor shots. Hides AI weaknesses.

tier2_usable.description: Woman at dumpsters wide. Atmospheric haze, rust patina, sodium vs fluorescent.
tier2_usable.use: Production still quality. Strongest 'movie still' character-in-environment frame.

tier2_usable.description: Wet floor reflections, rust patina dumpsters, sodium/fluorescent interplay.
tier2_usable.use: Environment reference — back alley / service area.

tier2_usable.description: Extreme close-up face through glass. Pores, capillaries, iris detail.
tier2_usable.use: Character close-up reference. Minor softness on nose bridge.

tier2_usable.description: Large-scale surveillance command center. Atmospheric haze, practical hardware.
tier2_usable.use: Style reference — Astrodome interior command post.

tier2_usable.description: Abandoned dome / improvised HQ. Wet concrete, debris, scaffolding, mixed practicals.
tier2_usable.use: Style reference — Astrodome interior production design.

tier2_usable.description: Garage threshold silhouette. Fluorescent tube falloff, concrete texture, yellow bollard.
Underground parking garage. Fluorescent spill, tire marks, wet concrete.
Derelict dome interior. Volumetric light shafts through broken skylights.
tier2_usable.use: Mood reference — Astrodome atmosphere. Slightly too symmetrical trusses.

tier2_usable.description: Deadbolt macro, gorgeous bokeh. Slight melted chrome quality.

tier3_concept_only.description: Hand gripping lock. Mushy finger geometry, warped text on glass.
Character in environment. Waxy face, painted catchlights.
Woman close-up in warehouse. Good lighting, but pore detail falls to uncanny valley.
Batcave solo workstation. Holographic UI screens read as CG.
PARKING GARAGE sign approach. Good fog but reversed text, too-perfect diffusion.
Rooftop Texas DOJ Bat-Signal. Cleanly rasterized projection, inconsistent window logic.
Interior dome command post. Production design reference only — clearly digital rendering.
tier3_concept_only.note: Use for scene layout, NOT style ref

tier3_concept_only.description: Mall stride side profile. Waxy skin, melted mannequins, wrong hands.
Rooftop signal cityscape. Commercial overlay breaks immersion.

tier4_rejected.description: Dome exterior AI render. Painterly, overstyled. Will contaminate realism.
TCPW Tactical suit turnaround. Waxy skin, video-game shader, concept art.
tier4_rejected.note: REJECTED — character ref needs full regeneration
REJECTED by QG — waxy skin, hand errors, sterile fabric
REJECTED by QG — garbled text, impossible geometry, synthetic sheen
REJECTED by QG — synthetic sheen, garbled text, floating shadows
REJECTED by QG — HDR glow, impossible geometry, waxy textures

summary.key_finding: Environments and silhouettes are production-ready (8-10). Character close-ups need work (6-8). All vehicle/equipment refs are rejected (4-5). The project excels when AI weaknesses are hidden through composition choices (silhouettes, distance, shadow).
summary.biggest_gap: Zero approved character or vehicle references. Hero tactical gear, interceptor motorcycle, and crew members all need to be created from scratch with QG pre-screening.
